Question 35
Indian Premier League has divided the sixteen cricket teams into two equal pools : Pool-A and Pool-B.  
Four teams of Pool-A have blue logo jerseys while the rest four have red log jerseys.  Five teams of Pool-
B have blue logo jerseys while the rest three have red logo jerseys.
If one team from each pool reaches the final, the probability that one team has a blue logo jersey and 
another has a red logo jersey is ________ (rounded off to one decimal place).
